library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(purrr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

dat <- read_xlsx("metaBUS-Ver2-08_MasterDB_JAP-PPsych_1980-2010.xlsx", sheet = "DATA")

# sample sizes
data_percentiles_n <- dat |>
  distinct(ArticleID, .keep_all = TRUE) |>
  summarise(
    percentile = c(1, 5, 10, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 75, 80, 90, 95, 99) / 100,
    total_n = map_dbl(percentile, ~ quantile(N, probs = .x, na.rm = TRUE)),
  ) |>
  mutate(total_n = janitor::round_half_up(total_n, 0))

data_percentiles_n |>
  kable() |>
  kable_classic(full_width = FALSE)


data_percentiles_r <- dat |>
  summarise(
    percentile = c(1, 5, 10, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 70, 75, 80, 90, 95, 99) / 100,
    abs_r = map_dbl(percentile, ~ quantile(abs(r), probs = .x, na.rm = TRUE)),
  ) 

data_percentiles_r |>
  kable() |>
  kable_classic(full_width = FALSE)
